|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi R2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = S (1GB) |revision = v1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/07/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/NanoPi_R2S |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3328; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A4G165WE-BCRC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8153B; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.10;; |stockos = Linux;5.4.61;FriendlyWrt;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Micro-B) Female
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, fan header, RTC, |addchip = Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1;,,, 4 Channel ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;4;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1, |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Ubuntu 18.04
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2020 |estprice = 22 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAP3DBHS8262 |asin = B08D9K6QFJ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "NanoPi R2S" and "V1.0 1912" are silk-screened on top and bottom of board.
{{see also|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3228 @1.5GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Ports: 2x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R2S ''NanoPi R2S'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-rk3328-sbc-offers-dual-gbe-for-22/ ''Open-spec RK3328 SBC offers dual GbE for $22'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/03/25/buy-nanopi-r2s-dual-gbe-iot-board-and-gateway/ ''NanoPi R2S Dual GbE IoT Board and Gateway Launched for $22 and Up'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
